channel.title: Typescript on Bluepie's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on Bluepie's Journal

item.title: Html to React
item.description: I’ve been doing new development in my offtime and i’m totally enjoying the challenges and hurdles. I wanted to share an interesting problem that I solved, it is a small part on a project that is not public yet (as of 2021 SEP). Problem I have a htmlString that I have to convert to react elements. but why?… the main reasons were I have a react wrapper, that enhances the dom-elements.

item.title: Why I Choose Typescript
item.description: Hello, we meet again!, how was the week? hope you are well and gud!, This post will be about typescript, I’m not explaining what it is, but rather why i choose to use it. TypeScript was everywhere - background First of all, I want to clear some air by opening up, In in past, I hated typescript with a passion, Since then I’ve grown a lot as a person, lol.
